page.title: 19INTERESTING BUILDINGS 2/2
page.content:
There are several interesting buildings near the church of St Mary:
{Schoolroom}- map reference 806944 Fifteen metres S.E. of church. Two storey cob building with slate roof. External steps to doors on first floor. {Cottages}- map reference 805944 Thirty metres S.W. of church. Two storey re-roofed with slate. Two gabled dormer windows in centre. L.H. cottage has two pigeon holes. {Little Haven, Golds lane}- map reference 806942 Two storey cob with thatched roof. Four casement windows.
OTHER BUILDINGS OF NOTE:
{Little Fairwood}- map ref 827948, 17C {Thornwood}- map ref 812945, 19C
